fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An identifier from the third party for the authenticated user, such as the Facebook user number or the Salesforce user ID.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: The first name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: The last name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: The full name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: link
fields.description: A stable link for the authenticated user such as https://www.facebook.com/MyUsername.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username of the authenticated user in the third party.

fields.name: locale
fields.description: The standard locale string for the authenticated user.

fields.name: provider
fields.description: The service used to log in, such as Facebook or Janrain.

fields.name: siteLoginUrl
fields.description: The site login page URL passed in if used with a site; null otherwise.

constuctors.name: UserData
constuctors.signature: public UserData(String identifier, String firstName, String lastName, String fullName, String email, String link, String userName, String locale, String provider, String siteLoginUrl, Map<String,String> attributeMap)
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the Auth.UserData class using the specified arguments.
